publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1719 Chris Ballance: UN International Day of Peace—That the Parliament expresses its support for the United Nations’ International Day of Peace on 21 September 2004 and congratulates Ben Macpherson on walking from Edinburgh to London to publicise the day.
S2M-1719 UN International Day of Peace (lodged on 17 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*, Mark Ballard*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-1719 UN International Day of Peace (lodged on 17 September 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Elaine Smith*, David Mundell*, Alex Neil*, Eleanor Scott*, Dr Jean Turner*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Richard Lochhead*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1719 UN International Day of Peace (lodged on 17 September 2004) Bill Butler*, Patrick Harvie*, Trish Godman*
S2M-1719 UN International Day of Peace (lodged on 17 September 2004) Mike Pringle*, Scott Barrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1719 UN International Day of Peace (lodged on 17 September 2004) Marlyn Glen*
